cards.title: Palmreader
powers: {PalmreaderCharacter} may deal 1 target 0 melee damage. {PalmreaderCharacter} may deal another target 1 projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.
Select a target. Increase the next damage dealt by that target by 2.
The 2 hero targets with the lowest HP regain 1 HP each.

openingLines.default: I already know your next move, but you may as well try.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter:
...
I don't know if I have a counter for this.

cards.title: Attitude Shift
body: Search your deck for a Relay card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may destroy an Ongoing or environment card. If you do, you may play an Ongoing card.

cards.title: Centering Exercises
body: Shuffle your trash into your deck.
{PalmreaderCharacter} regains 4 HP.
Draw a card.
Immediately end your turn.

cards.title: Everywhere at Once
body: Redirect all damage that would be dealt to hero targets to {PalmreaderCharacter}.
Reduce damage dealt to {PalmreaderCharacter} by 1.
At the start of your turn, discard 3 cards or destroy this card.

cards.title: Hyperfocus
body: Whenever a Relay card enters play, it becomes indestructible until the end of the turn and you may play a Relay card from your trash.
powers: {PalmreaderCharacter} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each. If there are 3 or more Relay cards in play, return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Idle Hands
body: {PalmreaderCharacter} deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
If that target was in a play area with a Relay card, {PalmreaderCharacter} deals another target in that play area 2 irreducible projectile damage.

cards.title: Irresistible Urge
body: {PalmreaderCharacter} deals 1 target 4 projectile damage.
The next damage dealt to {PalmreaderCharacter} by a non-hero target is irreducible.

cards.title: Join Hands
body: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
Each hero target regains 2 HP.
One hero may use a power.

cards.title: Mental Lock
body: Search your deck for a Relay card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may play a Relay card or draw 2 cards.
{PalmreaderCharacter} deals 1 target 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Momentary Fugue
body: Return all Relay cards in your play area to your hand.
{PalmreaderCharacter} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
You may play a Relay card or draw 3 cards.

cards.title: Precise Deflection
body: Once per turn, when a hero target would be dealt exactly 1 damage, you may prevent that damage.
When damage is prevented this way, up to X hero targets each regain 1 HP, where X = 2 times the number of Relay cards in hero play areas.

cards.title: Quicker than the Mind
body: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand and the rest into your trash.
You may play a card.

cards.title: Signal Flare
body: {PalmreaderCharacter} deals each non-hero target 2 projectile damage.
Destroy a Relay card in a non-hero play area.

cards.title: Signal Suppression
body: When this card enters play, you may play a card named [i]Signal Tap[/i] from your trash. Then, destroy all but 2 Relay cards.
Reduce the first damage dealt to {PalmreaderCharacter} each turn by 1. Increase the first damage dealt by {PalmreaderCharacter} each turn by 1.

cards.title: Signal Tap
body: When this card enters play, move it to a play area with no other Relay cards. You may play a Relay card from your trash. Then, destroy all but 2 Relay cards.
When damage would be dealt to or by {PalmreaderCharacter} to or by a target in this play area, you may increase or reduce that damage by 1.

cards.title: So Predictable
body: The first time {PalmreaderCharacter} is dealt damage by a target each turn, {PalmreaderCharacter} may deal that target 1 projectile damage.
powers: Draw a card. Increase the next damage dealt by {PalmreaderCharacter} by 2.
